author: Mike Robinson
method: Cook the noodle according to  the packet instructions. In a large bowl mix together the remaining ingredients. Drain and toss the noodles in the Thai mixture. Serve.
ingredients: 250g packet medium egg noodles,  1 tsp sesame oil,  2 tsp soy sauce,  1 tsp peeled and finely grated galangal,  2 bird's-eye red chillies, chopped,  2 tsp chopped fresh holy basil,  1 tsp chopped fresh coriander,  1 lime, juice only,  1 tsp clear honey,  1 tsp sesame seeds
